code: import axios from"axios";export var GET_PATIENT_DATA="GET_PATIENT_FETCH";export var FETCHING_PATIENT_DATA="FETCHING_PATIENT_DATA";export var ERROR_PATIENT_DATA="ERROR_PATIENT_DATA";export var getPatientData=function getPatientData(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:FETCHING_PATIENT_DATA});axios.get('https://api.covid19india.org/raw_data.json').then(function(resp){dispatch({type:GET_PATIENT_DATA,payload:resp.data.raw_data.reverse().slice(0,50)});}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);dispatch({type:ERROR_PATIENT_DATA,payload:"Error Occured. Try again"});});};};
